text: وَجَعَلۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡ أَئِمَّةٗ يَهۡدُونَ بِأَمۡرِنَا لَمَّا صَبَرُواْۖ وَكَانُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا يُوقِنُونَ

translation.en: And We made from among them leaders guiding by Our command when they were patient and [when] they were certain of Our signs
translation.id: (Dan Kami jadikan diantara mereka itu pemimpin-pemimpin yang memberi petunjuk dengan perintah Kami selama mereka sabar.661) Mereka meyakini ayat-ayat Kami
